member.name: MONITOR_APP_VISIBILITY
member.summary: Specifies whether a display is showing desktop windows instead of Windows Store apps.

member.name: MONITOR_APP_VISIBILITY.MAV_UNKNOWN
member.summary: The display state is not known.

member.name: MONITOR_APP_VISIBILITY.MAV_NO_APP_VISIBLE
member.summary: The display is showing desktop windows.

member.name: MONITOR_APP_VISIBILITY.MAV_APP_VISIBLE
member.summary: The display is not showing desktop windows.
